short: Matteo, 20 years old. Junior fullstack developer.
Currently in work-study at Lenrek Informatique as a developer.
long: My name is Matteo, I'm 20 years old and I'm an IT student at Lens UIT.
I'm currently in work-study at Lenrek Informatique as a developer.
I like to discover and learn new technologies, currently, I'm training in web development, in TypeScript in particular.
I plan to train later on the lower level development, in C++ and/or C#.

otherInfos: I love playing video games, my favorite ones are Overwatch 2, Hollow Knight and Subnautica.
I also like new technologies, and development.
I like to listen to all kinds of music.
My mother tongue is French, and I have a good level of English.
